scripts.deploy: npm run build:deployer && cd deployer && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/threepass_deployer.wasm
scripts.deploy:force: npm run build:deployer && cd deployer && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/threepass_deployer.wasm --force
scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:deployer && npm run build:web
scripts.build:deployer: cd deployer && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:contract: cd vault && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:cargo: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.deps-install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ..
